website_summaries.verdict: Shopkins fans love the little Shopkins accessories, so adding a Lil' Shoppie doll like Marsha Mello to the mix will increase youngsters' play possibilities.
pros: A pretty Lil' Shoppie with multi-colored braids
Marsha Mello comes with a purse shaped in her namesake that includes her own mini doll
A nice addition to any Shopkins collection

customer_reviews.title: Happy daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to have this one added to her collection. Package a was a bit damaged, but not sure if it was caused by mailman pushing it into the mailbox. Product itself was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.Uppenkamp

customer_reviews.title: High quality item and Amazon's fantastic service.
customer_reviews.text: My little grand daughter loved it. It made her Christmas special. Very good quality and it was delivered as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Downs

customer_reviews.title: Well received.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted this doll really really bad. I can see it will be a popular Christmas present . The product came right away. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daugther for hollidays and she love it.
customer_reviews.author: Davie Siu

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Came in time for my daughter's celebration. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: K-Rona

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable dolls. My daughter wants them all. They are candy colored and themed dolls so they are bright and cheery. They are well made and the hairstyles are done well and stay putbpretty well during play. The cute little mini doll is an added bonus. It came with its own little mini house attached to a necklace that my daughter takes everywhere with her, you know just incase she has a chance to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves the hair, but it's nothing amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes the doll's hair, but the locket is just ok. The mini-doll doesn't fit so well in the spots it's supposed to fit in. The big doll is pretty good. I like how the arms have elbows. I wish the knees bent too. But it does have decent movement and the outfit is cute. I would prefer it not to have so much makeup, but It's a pretty good doll set. I wish the locket and mini were as well made as polly pocket once was.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Marsha & Mini
customer_reviews.text: the larger doll is definitely a kid magnet. She has a glittery outfit that is removalbe, an adorable name and great hair. Her purse opens up to a miniature donut shop. It is quite small and fairly involed for something so small. She has her own mini me doll. There is also a locket for the child to wear. It is reminiscent of the Plly POcket dolls or yore. cute but be careful with small children. some of the component sare quite small and easy to lose or choke on.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Cute shopkins set
customer_reviews.text: This shopkins set is pretty cute, it comes with a larger sized figure which is very posable, and a smaller locket that fits a mini-sized version of the larger doll. Our only complaint is that the locket we received doesn't latch very well and sometimes it gets bumped open accidentally and the little shoppie inside falls out, which can be kind of difficult to find since it is so tiny.
customer_reviews.author: tangent

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: The Marsha Mello Shopkins doll is adorable. Her outfit and hair are so cute. My daughter totally loves her. She comes with a purse that opens up and has a tiny version of her. My daughter likes her better than her other Shoppie dolls and I do too. She goes well thematically with the Lil Secrets Shops that my daughter is currently collecting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Squeal

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Marsha Mello she is about 5 and 1/2 inches tall. The purse is like a big marshmallow and comes with a lanyard to make her purse into a necklace. There is also a mini diary that any little girl would love. In the purse is 1 x Secret Lock 1 x Teeny Shoppie 1 x Tiny Shopkin 1 x Secret Map Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara ( Babs ) Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Shopkin with teeny Shopkin and a locket that opens up into a small play set for the teeny doll
customer_reviews.text: The set includes a doll that is about 5 inches tall with cute pastel-colored hair. She can be somewhat put in different poses and comes dressed in an adorable candy striped type of outfit. Her locket opens up into a small play set in which her teeny Shopkin can interact. There are very small pieces associated with this, so it's recommended for children who are at least 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoppie!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love these shoppies. Especially the little necklace with the hidden rooms inside. I prefer these to the other Shopkin dolls because they have more to them.
customer_reviews.author: iminsomuchlove

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. It seems well done. Not much to say beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shopkins Lil' Secrets Shoppies
product_meta.description:
Marsha Mello and her friends are on an all new adventure in Shopville, uncovering a secret, tiny hidden world. 

With an all new outfit and a purse that opens up into a miniature playset for her Teeny self, it's the Shoppies' most stylish adventure yet.

Shoppies stand approximately 5.5" tall, and are compatible with most Shopkins playsets

What's In the Box

1 x Secret Lock
1 x Teeny Shoppie
1 x Tiny Shopkin
1 x Secret Map
feature_bullets: Marsha Mello comes with a marshmallow shaped purse that opens into a tiny Donut Shop, and a lanyard to transform her purse into your necklace
Also includes a mini secret diary and a doll stand

Marsha Mello has her three-toned pink, blue, and white hair styled into a braided bow with the iconic Shoppie oversized head piece. She wears a removable layered glitter tulle skirt and a pair of bow-themed shoes.
Don't forget to check out Peppa-Mint, Donatina, Jessicake, Tia Tigerlily and Sia Shells to complete your Lil' Secrets Shoppies collection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
